privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.text_who: TV Randshow and its services are provided by Matias de Andrea in Spain.
privacy.text_permissions_1: What follows are explanations of why TV Randshow requires certain permissions.
privacy.text_permissions_2: Full network access: to get data about tv shows.
privacy.text_contact_1: If you contact me (such as via Email), I may keep a record of your communications to help solve any issues you might be facing. I may use your email address or contact data to inform you about TV Randshow, such as letting you know about upcoming changes or improvements.
privacy.text_contact_3: if you want your contact data and sent messages to be deleted.
privacy.text_about_first_2: TV information and images are provided by TMDb, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDb.com or its affiliates.
privacy.text_about_second_3:
Made on Espa√±a by Matias de Andrea
